<?php
	// Create a stream
	$opts = array(
	  'http'=>array(
		'method'=>""GET"",
		'header'=>""Accept-language: en\r\n"" .
				  ""Cookie: foo=bar\r\n""
	  )
	);
	$context = stream_context_create($opts);
	// Open the file using the HTTP headers set above
	$file = file_get_contents('http://www.example.com/', false, $context);
	?>
